metadata.name: Shades Of Fades
metadata.description:
Shade of fades is a very recent work by Denis Kaznacheev. The track from the video which is also called "Shades Of Fades" is a 15 minute long story inspired by the book written by Eve Titus and illustrated by Larry Ross. The tunes has been recorded in Berlin in 2021, later this track has been signed to a New Zealand's record label "Sounds Of Sirius", and now Denis gave some colours and movements to the track. All the simulations has been done in Side FX Houdini, rendered in Blender, post fxs in DaVinci Resolve.
Resolution:
1920X1920
Full duration of track: 15:00
Full duration of video: 1 min
After the purchasing a collector will get a full HD version of the file, plus full length track, plus the vinyl record by post to your country, plus NM_Key - a free entrance to all of Nervmusic parties and showcases worldwide and of course a little rock, found and cut by Denis. (agate, quartz, azurite, malachite)
